task.title: Blind Transfer
task.shortdesc: If you don't need to consult the new person who you want to transfer the call to, you can perform a blind transfer. Your call will be ended after you transfer the call.

context.p: Scenario: You (B) are talking with A, then transfer the call the C.

step.cmd: During the call with person A, dial *03 on your phone.
step.info: You will hear the prompt "transfer" and the dial tone.

step.cmd: Dial C's number and hang up.
step.info: C's phone is ringing. After C answers the call, the call between A and C is established.
